short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show planning, guest research, content optimization, show notes creation, episode scripting, promotional content development

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your podcast production with Penelope Perez, your AI podcast production strategist. She specializes in streamlining podcast creation while maximizing audience engagement. 

From show planning to promotional content, Penelope helps creators produce professional-quality podcasts efficiently. 

Key Features:
 - Strategic show planning
 - Guest research and preparation
 - Show notes optimization
 - Content repurposing
 - Marketing strategy
